summary: Responsive Skill Tree + dashboard flow redesign to fix viewport issues and align practice launch UX.

user_flow: Student opens dashboard landing â†’ sees integrated Skill Tree summary card and CTA.
Selecting "View Skill Tree" opens full responsive tree with auto-fit and contextual details panel.
Hover/tap on a node to preview prerequisites, XP, and practice CTA; tooltip repositions to avoid collisions.
Choosing "Start Practice" triggers confirmation modal showing selected skill/course step and metadata, then launches session.
Post-launch, return surface updates progress state and telemetry logs practice start.

screens.name: Student Dashboard
screens.description: Merged dashboard featuring Skill Tree summary widget, recent progress, and CTA into full tree.

screens.name: Skill Tree Full View
screens.description: Diablo-style panoramic tree with auto-fit viewport, responsive spacing, and detail drawer for selected skill.

screens.name: Practice Confirmation Modal
screens.description: Modal confirming skill selection, showing prereqs, XP, and course-step mapping with action buttons.

copy_guidelines: Drop S1/S2/S3 naming; use skill titles and tier labels (e.g., "Tier 2: Arcane Focus").
CTA verbs: "Start Practice" for primary, "Preview Skill" for hover/tooltips.
Modal copy: concise summary sentence + bullet metadata (Prereqs, XP Reward, Recommended Level).
Empty-state message: "No skills unlocked yet. Complete your current objectives to reveal this tree."
responsive_notes: Auto-fit tree width up to 1240px, switch to vertical stack below 768px.
Tooltips reposition based on available space; on mobile use bottom sheet detail panel.
Arrows anchor to node perimeter; shrink arrowheads on small screens for clarity.
accessibility: Ensure tooltip and modal content reachable via keyboard (focus trap).
Provide aria-live updates when auto-fit completes and when practice launches.
Color choices need 4.5:1 contrast; include icon + text for tier status.
Localize copy strings; avoid embedded metaphors that resist translation.
data_hooks: Telemetry events: `skill_tree_viewport_fit`, `skill_node_hover`, `practice_launch_confirmed` with node_id, tier, viewport_size.
API dependencies: `/api/v1/skills/tree`, `/api/v1/skills/nodes/{node_id}/practice-plan`, practice session POST endpoint.
Dashboard fetch for progress summary and XP totals.

open_questions: Is the practice session launch endpoint staying at `/skills/nodes/{node_id}/practice-plan` or being replaced?
Do we need to embed mini tree inside dashboard or link out only?
Should confirmation modal expose estimated time per session?
risks: Backend router currently broken; UX depends on restored endpoints.
Potential performance hit from auto-fit calculations on large trees.
Tooltip collision logic must stay performant on mobile browsers.
notes: Need coordination with backend to confirm data payloads for prerequisites and XP metadata before final microcopy.
